andromeda.why: Refuses flattery-driven hustle; ambition must not cost sovereignty.

arcturus.why: Apprenticeship setup—conditions, mentors, and scope before the climb.

draco.why: Proving rank by grinding through unsafe ladders.

lyra.why: Plain, credible presentation—no theatrics at the start.

orion-dark.why: Status bait—seductive hierarchy promising quick placement.

orion-light.why: Discipline to begin humbly and accept trials.

pleiades.why: Support network cushions early steps so ambition stays humane.

sirius.why: Pre-teaching stage—no formal covenant or oath transmission yet.

arcturus.why: Places people/resources where ambition can function—fit checks, staging.

draco.why: Gatekeeping to deter exploiters from accessing the ladder.

lyra.why: Sober optics—clear story of why this alliance serves the work.

orion-dark.why: Protocol used to smuggle hierarchy over merit.

orion-light.why: Honor the role, earn each rung.

pleiades.why: Relational care keeps ambition bonded, not parasitic.

sirius.why: Practical alliance placement; not yet a teaching channel.

andromeda.why: Reclaims choice after entangling climbs or compromised deals.

arcturus.why: Wobble in calibration—over/under-correcting terms and timing.

orion-dark.why: Ambition captured by hierarchy propaganda and favoritism.

orion-light.why: Ordeal: admit misreads, reset oath, rebuild on merit.

sirius.why: Self-forging through trial; no canon of ambition yet.

andromeda.why: Advocates ambition that serves sovereignty, not capture.

arcturus.why: Converts drive into protocol—terms, reviews, advancement criteria.

draco.why: Protects the ladder—keeps predatory shortcuts out.

lyra.why: Dignified presence makes merit-based rises visible and clean.

sirius.why: Ambition protocol teaching—oath, sponsorship, and review law by example.

andromeda.why: Resists propaganda that justifies corrupt advancement ‘for the tribe.’

arcturus.why: Projected as universal fixer/connector → burnout/scapegoat when refusing.

draco.why: Power contests at the gate to control who rises.

lyra.why: Credible, unshowy gravitas steadies high-visibility moves.

orion-dark.why: Narrative control—PR alliances to reinstall hierarchy.

orion-light.why: Integrity under projection—accept only clean terms of ascent.

sirius.why: Instruction-by-presence: ethics of advancement amid politics and myth.

andromeda.why: Liberates communities from capture-ladders—returns to living merit.

arcturus.why: Elder standards—clear rites, periodic reviews, sunset clauses on rank.

draco.why: Measured strength—guards the ladder from predation without tyranny.

lyra.why: Quiet majesty—culture tunes to sober, dignified advancement.

orion-light.why: Warrior elder—rite-based ascent, proportionate honor, clean refusals.

sirius.why: Ambition sage—teaches covenant law of rank, oath, and rightful ascent.
